member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcError.DataStackFieldName

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcError.DataCodeFieldName
member.summary: The name of the error object's "data.code" field within the data object.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCode.InvocationError
member.summary: Indicates the RPC call was made but the target threw an exception.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCode.NoCallbackObject
member.summary: No callback object was given to the client but an RPC call was attempted.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCode.ParseError
member.summary: Invalid JSON was received by the server. An error occurred on the server while parsing the JSON text.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCode.InvalidRequest
member.summary: The JSON sent is not a valid Request object.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCode.InvalidParams

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCode.InternalError
member.summary: Internal JSON-RPC error.

member.name: T:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler
member.summary: An abstract base class for for sending and receiving distinct string messages over a channel that provides no natural boundaries and no built-in character encoding.
member.remarks: This class and its derivates are safe to call from any thread. Read and write requests are protected by a semaphore to guarantee message integrity and may be made from any thread.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.disposalTokenSource
member.summary: The source of a token that is canceled when this instance is disposed.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.sendingSemaphore
member.summary: A semaphore acquired while sending a message.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.receivingSemaphore
member.summary: A semaphore acquired while receiving a message.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.encoding
member.summary: The character encoding to use for the transmitted content.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The stream used to transmit messages. May be null.
The stream used to receive messages. May be null.
The character encoding to use when transmitting messages.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding to use for transmitted messages.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.CanRead
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this message handler has a receiving stream.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this message handler has a sending stream.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.SendingStream
member.summary: Gets the stream used to transmit messages. May be null.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.ReceivingStream
member.summary: Gets the stream used to receive messages. May be null.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.DisposalToken
member.summary: Gets a token that is canceled when this instance is disposed.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.ReadAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads a distinct and complete message from the stream, waiting for one if necessary.
member.param: A token to cancel the read request.
member.returns: A task whose result is the received messages.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.WriteAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes a message to the stream.
member.param: The message to write.
A token to cancel the transmission.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes this instance, and cancels any pending read or write operations.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes resources allocated by this instance.
member.param: true when being disposed; false when being finalized.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.ReadCoreAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads a distinct and complete message from the stream, waiting for one if necessary.
member.param: A token to cancel the read request.
member.returns: A task whose result is the received messages.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.DelimitedMessageHandler.WriteCoreAsync(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes a message to the stream.
member.param: The message to write.
The encoding to use for .
A token to cancel the transmission.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: T:StreamJsonRpc.RemoteMethodNotFoundException
member.summary: Remote RPC exception that indicates that the requested target method was not found on the server.
member.remarks: Check the exception message for the reasons why the method was not found. It's possible that there was a method with the matching name, but it was not public, had ref or out params, or its arguments were incompatible with the arguments supplied by the client.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.RemoteMethodNotFoundException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with supplied message and target method.
member.param: Exception message describing why the method was not found.
Target method that was not found.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.RemoteMethodNotFoundException.TargetMethod
member.summary: Gets the name of the target method that was not found.

member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.RemoteRpcException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler
member.summary: Adds headers before each text message transmitted over a stream.
member.remarks: This is based on the language server protocol spec: https://github.com/Microsoft/language-server-protocol/blob/master/protocol.md#base-protocol

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler.MaxHeaderElementSize
member.summary: The maximum supported size of a single element in the header.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler.DefaultContentEncoding
member.summary: The default encoding to use when writing content, and to assume as the encoding when reading content that doesn't have a header identifying its encoding.

member.name: F:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler.HeaderEncoding
member.summary: The encoding to use when writing/reading headers.
member.remarks: Although the spec dictates using ASCII encoding, that's equivalent to UTF8 for the characters we expect to be sending and receiving, and portable profiles don't have ASCII available. Also note that when writing we use the encoding set by this field, but when reading, we have highly optimized code that hard-codes the assumption that each character is one byte.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The stream used to transmit messages. May be null.
The stream used to receive messages. May be null.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler.SubType
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to use as the subtype in the Content-Type header (e.g. "application/SUBTYPE").

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.HeaderDelimitedMessageHandler.ParseEncodingFromContentTypeHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the content encoding from a Content-Type header.
member.param: The value of the Content-Type header.
member.returns: The Encoding, if the header specified one; otherwise null.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpc.InvokeAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Invoke a method on the server.
member.param: The name of the method to invoke on the server. Must not be null or empty string.
Method argument, must be serializable to JSON.
member.returns: A task that completes when the server method executes.
member.exception: Result task fails with this exception if the communication channel ends before the server indicates completion of the method.
Result task fails with this exception if the server method throws an exception.
Result task fails with this exception if the method is not found on the target object on the server.
Result task fails with this exception if the server has no target object.
If is null.
If this instance of has been disposed.

Result task fails with this exception if the server has no target object.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.ReadBufferingStream.FirstBlockLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the first block of data in our buffer (before wraparound).

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.ReadBufferingStream.WraparoundBlockLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the block of data that wrapped around to the front of our buffer.

member.name: T:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcMethodAttribute
member.summary: Attribute which changes the name by which this method can be invoked over JSON-RPC. If applied on a method, the method's CLR name can no longer be used for remote invocation.
member.remarks:
This attribute should be used when rpc message method names can be different from the actual CLR method names. Useful in cases where rpc message method names contain illegal characters for CLR method names, i.e. "text/OnDocumentChanged".
If methods are overloaded, each overload must define its own with all the same values. Conflicts will result in error being thrown during construction.
If methods are overridden, the base class can define a and derived classes will inherit the attribute. If derived class and base class have conflicting values for a method, an error will be thrown during construction.

member.name: M:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Replacement name of a method.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.JsonRpcMethodAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the replacement name of a method.

member.name: T:StreamJsonRpc.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.AttachTargetAfterStartListeningError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot attach additional target once JsonRpc has started listening for messages..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.BothReadableWritableAreNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Both readable and writable are null..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.ConflictingMethodAttributeValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to .NET methods '{0}' and '{1}' cannot both map to the same request method name: '{2}'..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.ConflictingMethodNameAttribute
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to All overloads and overrides of the '{0}' method must share a common value for {1}.{2}..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.DroppingRequestDueToNoTargetObject
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Got a request to execute '{0}' but have no callback object. Dropping the request..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.ErrorWritingJsonRpcResult
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error writing JSON RPC Result: {0}: {1}.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.FailureDeserializingJsonRpc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failure deserializing incoming JSON RPC '{0}': {1}.

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.FillBufferFirst
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The buffer is empty. Call the async method to fill it first..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.HeaderContentLengthNotParseable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed parsing Content-Length header into a positive integer..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.HeaderValueTooLarge
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The size of the message header exceeds the maximum supported size..

member.name: P:StreamJsonRpc.Resources.InvalidAfterListenHasStarted
